subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. is concentrating this week on winning his first Brickyard event, the Allstate 400, a race considered to be the second biggest in the Nascar Nextel Cup.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. is concentrating this week on winning his first Brickyard event, the Allstate 400, a race considered to be the second biggest in the Nascar Nextel Cup.
